value.string:
"""
 The release signature is a kind of declarative
 specification of an upgrader.
 """
 
 ALARM_DICT = {
 "bt5_upgrader" : True,
 "finalize_upgrader" : True
 }
 
 REQUIRED_BT5_ID_LIST = (
 'erp5_core_proxy_field_legacy',
 'erp5_core',
 'erp5_property_sheets',
 'erp5_upgrader',
 'vifib_upgrader',
 'erp5_xhtml_style',
 'erp5_administration',
 'erp5_ingestion_mysql_innodb_catalog',
 'erp5_mysql_innodb_catalog',
 'erp5_full_text_myisam_catalog',
 'erp5_jquery',
 'erp5_jquery_ui',
 'erp5_l10n_fr',
 'erp5_ods_style',
 'erp5_odt_style',
 'erp5_base',
 'erp5_computer_immobilisation',
 'erp5_credential',
 'erp5_ingestion',
 'erp5_pdm',
 'erp5_simulation',
 'erp5_web',
 'erp5_forge',
 'erp5_trade',
 'erp5_item',
 'erp5_open_trade',
 'erp5_simulation_test',
 'erp5_crm',
 'erp5_knowledge_pad',
 'erp5_dms',
 'erp5_content_translation',
 'erp5_software_pdm',
 'erp5_accounting',
 'erp5_accounting_l10n_fr',
 'erp5_tax_resource',
 'erp5_discount_resource',
 'erp5_invoicing',
 'erp5_ooo_import',
 'erp5_simplified_invoicing',
 'erp5_legacy_tax_system',
 'erp5_commerce',
 'erp5_project',
 'erp5_km',
 'erp5_web_download_theme',
 'vifib_mysql_innodb_catalog',
 'vifib_core',
 'vifib_base',
 'vifib_slap',
 'vifib_crm',
 'vifib_open_trade',
 'vifib_forge_release',
 'vifib_software_pdm',
 'vifib_web',
 'vifib_l10n_fr',
 'vifib_erp5',
 )
 
 INTEGRITY_VERIFICATION_SCRIPT_ID_LIST = ('ERP5Site_verifyUpgradeIntegrity',
 'ERP5Site_verifyBT5UpgradeIntegrity',
 'ERP5Site_verifyMemcachedIntegrity',
 'ERP5Site_verifySQLCatalogFilterIntegrity',
 'ERP5Site_verifyActivityIntegrity')
 
 ALARM_TOOL_CONFIGURATION_LIST = (
 ('accept_submitted_credentials', 1),
 ('confirm_ordered_sale_order', 1)
 )
 
 UPDATE_ROLE_PORTAL_TYPE_LIST = [
 'Assignment',
 'Computer',
 'Currency',
 'Hosting Subscription',
 'Internal Packing List',
 'Open Sale Order',
 'Organisation',
 'Person',
 'Purchase Packing List',
 'Sale Order',
 'Sale Packing List',
 'Sale Trade Condition',
 'Service',
 'Software Instance',
 'Software Product',
 'Software Release',
 ]
 
 FINALIZE_ALARM_SCRIPT = (
 'ERP5Site_upgradeSecurity',
 'ERP5Site_upgradeAlarmToolConfiguration', ) 
 
 # Wrap everything into a dict
 signature_dict = {
 'alarm_dict' : ALARM_DICT
 , 'required_bt5_id_list': REQUIRED_BT5_ID_LIST
 , 'integrity_verification_script_id_list': INTEGRITY_VERIFICATION_SCRIPT_ID_LIST
 , 'alarm_tool_configuration_list' : ALARM_TOOL_CONFIGURATION_LIST
 , 'finalize_upgrade_script_list': FINALIZE_ALARM_SCRIPT
 , 'update_role_portal_type_list': UPDATE_ROLE_PORTAL_TYPE_LIST
 }
 
 if item is not None:
 return signature_dict.get(item, None)
 else:
 return signature_dict
